messages.content: Hi, I'm so stoked for the game! I was wondering why y'all decided to go with Unreal Engine 4? Did it offer any unique benefits y'all are excited to use? Also, any thoughts on porting the game into Unreal Engine 5 once it's released?

There are a lot of factors that go into selecting a game engine. I'm hoping to one day have some articles on our company site sharing more details about the engineering choices we've made and the tech we use. 

A couple of interesting facts: we do have some ex-Epic folks on the dev team and that certainly helps. 

We're also very interested in UE5 and looking at it closely but have no plans for now.
